entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
